info.title: Modern Bakery API
info.description: API documentation for Modern Bakery project

post.description: Creates a new advance payment record. Accepts multipart/form-data to handle receipt image upload.

post.summary: Create a new caps collection transaction
post.description: Creates a new caps collection header with its associated details.

400.description: Failed to create caps collection transaction

get.summary: Get list of caps collection transactions
get.description: Fetches a paginated list of caps collection headers with optional filters and dropdown mode.

parameters.name: dropdown
parameters.description: If true, returns a simple dropdown-style list

get.summary: Get a single caps collection transaction by UUID
get.description: Fetches the details of a specific caps collection header along with its details.

parameters.name: uuid
parameters.description: UUID of the caps collection record

500.description: Failed to retrieve caps collection transaction

example.message: Failed to retrieve caps collection transaction

delete.description: Deletes a specific caps collection transaction by its UUID.

parameters.name: uuid
parameters.description: UUID of the caps collection transaction to delete

post.summary: Update status of multiple caps collection orders
post.description: Updates the status field for multiple caps collection transactions based on their UUIDs.

requestBody.description: Array of cap collection UUIDs and new status value

422.description: Validation error (invalid input or missing fields)

put.summary: Update an existing caps collection transaction
put.description: Updates header and details information of a caps collection transaction using its UUID.

parameters.name: uuid
parameters.description: UUID of the caps collection transaction to update

requestBody.description: Updated caps collection header and detail data

get.description: Exports all Caps Collection headers and details as XLSX or CSV file.

url.description: Public URL of the exported file

get.description: Fetches paginated list of collections with optional filters.

post.description: Creates a new exchange transaction with its related invoices and returns.

data.description: Created exchange transaction with invoices and returns

get.description: Retrieve a paginated list of exchange transactions. Supports pagination, dropdown mode, and filters.

parameters.name: dropdown
parameters.description: If true, returns simplified data for dropdown lists

parameters.name: filters
parameters.description: Optional filter parameters (e.g. status, customer_id, route_id)

get.description: Retrieve detailed information about a specific exchange transaction using its UUID.

delete.description: Deletes an exchange transaction by its UUID. Returns 200 on success, 404 if not found, and 500 if an internal error occurs.

parameters.name: uuid
parameters.description: UUID of the exchange transaction to delete

post.description: Update the status of multiple exchange transactions at once by providing their UUIDs and a new status value.

requestBody.description: List of exchange UUIDs and the new status value

status: The status field must be an integer.

post.description: Export all exchange headers along with invoices and returns. Supports xlsx (default) and csv formats.

post.summary: Update Load Header (UUID-based) with signature image and other fields
post.description: This endpoint updates a Load Header record using its UUID. It allows uploading a salesman signature image along with optional fields like accept_time, load_id, latitude, longitude, and sync_time.

parameters.name: uuid
parameters.description: UUID of the Load Header record

accept_time.description: Time when salesman accepted the load

load_id.description: Load ID associated with the header

sync_time.description: Time when data was synced to the server

post.summary: Login API for salesman Mobile Api
post.description: Login by username, password and version check
Submit attendance data using multipart/form-data including optional check-in image.

post.summary: Generate today's customer list for a salesman
post.description: This API generates a TXT file containing the list of customers assigned to a salesman for today's visit based on route, visit schedule, and current weekday. The response contains the URL to download the TXT file.

message.example: Today visit customer list generated successfully

400.description: Invalid request payload or missing parameter

post.description: Stores a new request made by a salesman

salesman_id: The salesman id field is required.

post.summary: Fetch and save all master data
post.description: This API fetches master data from database tables like items, customer categories, outlet channels, pricing headers, etc., and saves them as text files in storage. Returns the file paths.

500.description: Something went wrong while saving data

get.summary: Export competitor info data filtered by optional date range
get.description: Exports competitor info data joined with merchandiser name, filtered optionally by created_at date range. Supports CSV and Excel formats.

parameters.name: start_date
parameters.description: Start date filter (optional) in YYYY-MM-DD format

parameters.name: end_date
parameters.description: End date filter (optional) in YYYY-MM-DD format; must be equal or after start_date

parameters.description: Export file format (required). Allowed values: csv, xlsx

complaint.example: The product packaging was torn when received.

get.summary: Export complaint feedbacks filtered by date range
get.description: Export complaint feedback data filtered by optional date range. Date format is day-month-year (d-m-Y). The response is a downloadable CSV or Excel file.

parameters.description: Start date for filtering (format: d-m-Y, e.g. 09-08-2025)

parameters.name: end_date
parameters.description: End date for filtering (format: d-m-Y, e.g. 11-08-2025)
